What is the purpose of the `getcurrencyconverters` API in Verus?

The `getcurrencyconverters` API retrieves a list of currencies that meet certain conditions. These conditions include having at least 1000 VRSC in reserve, a VRSC reserve ratio greater than 10%, and having all listed currencies as reserves.

verters` API retrieves all currencies that have at least 1000 VRSC in reserve, are greater than 10% VRSC reserve ratio, and have all listed currencies as reserves
- **E.g. BTC ETH:**
```
verus -chain=VRSCTEST getcurrencyconverters btc eth
```
Will return all currencies that have btc/eth markets at or above the liquidity threshold.
